0.name: Adams
0.quote: When you left the house today, you had the intention of putting clothes on and you did. You didn’t try to put your pants on today. You simply put them on. The same has to hold for all of our intentions.

1.name: Ali
1.quote: Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even.

2.name: Ash
2.quote: Don't limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.

3.name: Avalokitiesvara
3.quote: Gate gate paragate parasamgate bodhi svaha. -- Gone, gone, gone all the way over, everyone gone to the other shore, enlightenment, svaha!

4.name: Bezos
4.who: Jeff Bezos, Amazon.com founder and CEO
4.quote: What's dangerous is not to evolve.

5.name: Bird
5.quote: I've got a theory that if you give 100% all of the time, somehow things work out in the end.

6.name: Borge
6.quote: Laughter is the closest distance between two people.

7.name: Branson
7.quote: Communication is the most important skill any entrepreneur can possess.

8.name: Brooks
8.quote: Risk something or forever sit with your dreams.

9.name: Brown
9.quote: The only thing that stands between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.

10.name: Buddha
10.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty ... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.

11.name: Buffett
11.quote: It's better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you'll drift in that direction. You're looking for three things, generally, in a person: intelligence, energy, and integrity. And if they don't have the last one, don't even bother with the first two.

12.name: Cage
12.quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.

13.name: Carver
13.quote: Where there is no vision, there is no hope.

14.name: Charles
14.quote: Do it right or don’t do it at all..

15.name: Collier
15.quote: Any thought that is passed on to the subconscious often enough and convincingly enough is finally accepted.

16.name: Cook
16.quote: You want to be the pebble in the pond that creates the ripple for change.

17.name: Cote
17.quote: To lead you have to address what people really want to know in a simple, transparent way. Just treating people wth respect makes a big difference.

18.name: Crosby
18.quote: Competitive effort winds up in war. Collaborative effort winds up in a symphony.

19.name: Dalio
19.quote: the greatest tragedy of mankind — or one of them — is that people needlessly hold wrong opinions in their minds.

20.name: Dalio
20.quote: To do exceptionally well you have to push your limits and that, if you push your limits, you will crash, and it will hurt a lot. You will think that you have failed--but that won't be true unless you give up.

21.name: Dalio
21.who: Ray Dalio, founder Bridgewater assoc. Principle one
21.quote: Start with a lofty but realistic goal. A concrete and well defined objective sets the direction of your life.

22.name: Dalio
22.who: Ray Dalio, founder Bridgewater assoc. Principle two
22.quote: Fail well and take meticulous notes when you do.

23.name: Dalio
23.who: Ray Dalio, founder Bridgewater assoc. Principle three
23.quote: Value truth over ego. Admitting your not always the source of every best idea is central to success.

24.name: Dalio
24.who: Ray Dalio, founder Bridgewater assoc. Principle four
24.quote: Quantify whatever you can. Success isn't an accident.

25.name: Dalio
25.who: Ray Dalio, founder Bridgewater assoc.         Principle five

26.name: Degrasse Tyson
26.quote: There's nothing wrong with cherry-picking the good stuff.

27.name: Diller
27.quote: The Internet came together as a miracle, really. Anyone with a wire can publish, we need to keep it that way.

28.name: Douglas
28.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
28.quote: Those traders that have confidence in their own trades, who trust themseles and do what needs to be done without hesitation, are the ones who become successful

29.name: Douglas
29.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
29.quote: Anything can happen. You don’t need to know what is going to happen next in order to make money.

30.name: Douglas
30.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
30.quote: There is a random distribution between wins and losses for any given set of variables that define an edge. An edge is nothing more than an indication of a higher probability of one thing happening over another. Every moment in the market is unique

31.name: Douglas
31.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
31.quote: When you've trained you mind to think in probabilities, it means you have fully accepted all the possibilities (with no internal resistance or conflict).

32.name: Douglas
32.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
32.quote: The degree by which you think you know, assume you know, or in any way need to know what is going to happen next, is equal to the degree to which you will fail as a trader.

33.name: Douglas
33.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
33.quote: Not defining the risk before getting into a trade is by far the most common of all trading errors, and starts the whole process of trading from an inappropriate perspective.

34.name: Douglas
34.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
34.quote: Instead of controlling our surroundings so they conform to our idea of the way thins should be, we can learn to control ourselves.

35.name: Douglas
35.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
35.quote: If you have the right attitude--the right mind-set--then everything else about trading will be relatively easy, even simple, and certainly a lot more fun.

36.name: Douglas
36.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
36.quote: If you perceive the endless stream of opportunities to enter and exit trades without self-criticism and regret, then you will be in the best frame of mind to act in you own best interest and learn from your experiences.

37.name: Douglas
37.who: Mark Douglas, Author Trading in the Zone
37.quote: Any degree of blaming means you have not accepted the reality the the market owes you nothing, regardless of what you want or think or how much effort you put into your trading.

38.name: Einstein
38.quote: Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it.

39.name: Eisenhower
39.quote: You do not lead by hitting people over the head--that's assault, not leadership.

40.name: Eisenhower
40.quote: Leadership consists of nothing but taking responsibilit for everything that goes wrong and giving credit for everything that goes well.

41.name: Ellington
41.quote: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.

42.name: Emerson
42.quote: A man is what he thinks about all day long.

43.name: Ford
43.quote: Never be satisfied with less than your very best effort. If you strive for the top and miss, you'll still beat the pack.

44.name: George
44.quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step when one is indicated. You can't cross a chasm in two small steps.

45.name: Ghandi
45.quote: A "No" uttered from the deepest conviction is better than a "Yes" merely uttered to please, or worse, to avoid trouble.

46.name: Glascow
46.quote: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.

47.name: Grossman
47.who: Mindy Grossman, CEO of WW International
47.quote: Not taking a risk is riskier than taking a risk.

48.name: Holiday
48.quote: You can’t reason people out of positions they didn’t reason themselves into.

49.name: Holt
49.quote: The true test of character is not how much we know how to do , but how we behave when we don't know what to do.

50.name: Hunter
50.quote: Wisdom is healed pain. You don't get wisdom because you just have it. You have to heal from some pain.

51.name: IBD
51.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number one
51.quote: How you think is Everything: Always be positive. Think success, not failure. Beware of a negative enviornment.

52.name: IBD
52.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number two
52.quote: DECIDE UPON YOUR TRUE DREAMS AND GOALS: Write down your specific goals and develop a plan to reach them

53.name: IBD
53.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number three
53.quote: TAKE ACTION: Goals are nothing without action. Don't be afraid to get started. Just do it.

54.name: IBD
54.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number four
54.quote: NEVER STOP LEARNING: Go back to school or read books. Get training and acquire skills.

55.name: IBD
55.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number five
55.quote: BE PERSISTENT AND WORK HARD: Success is a marathon, not a sprint. Never give up.

56.name: IBD
56.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number six
56.quote: LEARN TO ANALYZE DETAILS: Get all the facts, all the input. Learn from your mistakes.

57.name: IBD
57.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number seven
57.quote: FOCUS YOUR TIME AND MONEY: Don't let other people or things distract you.

58.name: IBD
58.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number eight
58.quote: DON'T BE AFRAID TO INNOVATE; BE DIFFERENT: Following the herd is a sure way to mediocrity.

59.name: IBD
59.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number nine
59.quote: DEAL AND COMMUNICATE WITH PEOPLE EFFECTIVELY: No person is an island. Learn to understand and motivate others.

60.name: IBD
60.who: 10 Traits of Successful People, Number ten
60.quote: BE HONEST AND DEPENDABLE; TAKE RESPONSIBILITY: Otherwise, Nos. 1-9 won't matter.

61.name: Irving
61.quote: You’ve got to get obsessed and stay obsessed.

62.name: Jobs
62.quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the nonsuccessfuls ones is pure perserverance.

63.name: Jobs
63.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

64.name: Jordan
64.quote: Get the fundamentals down and the level of everything you do will rise.

65.name: Jordan
65.quote: I’ve failed over and over again, and that is why I succeed.

66.name: Jung
66.quote: The privilege of a lifetime is to become who you truly are.

67.name: Kasparov
67.quote: There's on thing only humans can do, and that's dream, so let us dream

68.name: Kaukonen
68.quote: If life is designed to humble us in the face of time, there is joy in that humility.

69.name: Kesey
69.quote: You don't lead by pointing and telling people some place to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.

70.name: Lassalle
70.quote: Its a fact that when you hold your eyes very still, the flow of thought will stop.

71.name: Lutz
71.quote: If you actually 'do things' rather than merely perpetuate the status quo, there is a high probablilty, bordering on certainty that you will make mistakes

72.name: May
72.quote: The relationship between commitment and doubt is by no means an antagonistic one. Commitment is healthiest when it is not without doubt but in spite of doubt.

73.name: Meir
73.quote: I can honestly say that I was never affected by the question of the success of an undertaking. If I felt it was the right thing to do, I was for it regardless of the possible outcome.

74.name: Mitchell
74.quote: Having a plan takes much of the emotion out of trading..you know exactly what to do, how and when. We can't get rid of our emotions entirely, but the plan helps us control them so they aren't destructive

75.name: Morris
75.quote: If our work does not feel like play, then we should ask ourselves whether we are in the right job.

76.name: Murray
76.quote: Until one is commited, there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, ineffectiveness...whatever you can do, or dream you can do, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!

77.name: Nagel
77.quote: One sure guarantee of a mediocre life is a life lived in fear.

78.name: Nelson
78.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.

79.name: Newton
79.quote: If I have ever made any valuable discoveries, it has been owning more to patient attention than to any other talent.

80.name: O'Connonr
80.who: Sandra Day O'Connor, former Supreme Court Justice
80.quote: Do the best you can in every task no matter how unimportant it may seem at the time. No  one learns more about a problem than the person at the bottom.

81.name: Parks
81.quote: Each person must live their life as a role model for others.

82.name: Patterson
82.quote: An executive is a person who decides; sometime he decides correctly, but he always decides.

83.name: Rickover
83.quote: It is necessary for us to learn from other's mistakes. You will not live long enough to make tham all yourself.

84.name: Rometty
84.quote: I learned to always take on things I'd never done before. Growth and comfort do not coexist.

85.name: Roosevelt
85.who: Elanor Roosevelt, first lady of the U.S.
85.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you'll be criticized anyway.

86.name: Sirleaf
86.who: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, former president of Liberia
86.quote: If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.

87.name: Sophocles
87.quote: There is no success without hardship.

88.name: Sotomayor
88.who: Sonia Sotomayer, associate justice Supreme Court
88.quote: No matter how things are for you, they're harder for other people, and if you stick with it you can get around the brick walls in your life.

89.name: Spade
89.quote: Live in such a way that if anyone speaks badly of you no one would believe it.

90.name: Stimson
90.quote: The only way to make a man trustworthy is to trust him.

91.name: Thoreau
91.quote: I am grateful for what I am and have. My thanksgiving is perpetual.

92.name: Tillman
92.who: Pat Tillman, football player and U.S. army soldier
92.quote: A passion for life is contagious and uplifting.

93.name: Van Gogh
93.quote: Your profession is not what brings home your weekly paycheck; your profession is what you’re put here on earth to do, with such passion and such intensity that it becomes a spiritual calling.

94.name: Walsh
94.quote: Confidence stops you from learning. I can’t tell you how many confident blowhards I’ve seen in my coaching career who never got better after the age of 40.

95.name: Watson
95.quote: Expose your ideas to the dangers of controversy. Speak your mind and fear less the label of crackpot than the stigma of conformity.

96.name: Ziglar
96.quote: People often say motivation doesn't last. Well neither does bathing--that's why wee recommend it daily.

97.name: Robert H
97.quote: Trade management is more important than pattern identification.

98.name: O'Neil
98.quote: Successful trading is about finding rules that work and then sticking to those rules.

99.name: Ryan
99.who: Nolan Ryan, Hall of fame basketball player
99.quote: One of the beautiful things about baseball is that every once in a while you come into a situation where you want to, and where you have to, reach down and prove something.

100.name: Roberts
100.quote: Life is not so much what you accomplish as what you overcome.

101.name: Naisbitt
101.quote: The most reliable way to anticipate the future is to understand the present.

102.name: Federer
102.quote: What I think I've been able to do well over the years is play with pain, play with problems, play in all sorts of conditions.

103.name: Iacocca
103.quote: The discipline of writing something down is the first step toward making it happen.

104.name: Marden
104.quote: All who have accomplished great things have had a great aim, have fixed their gaze on a goal which was high, one which sometimes seemed impossible.

105.name: Peters
105.who: Tom Peters, author and management consultant
105.quote: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity.

106.name: Adler
106.quote: The hero is the one who kindles a great light in the world, who sets up blazing torches in the dark streets of life for men to see by. The saint is the man who walks through the dark paths of the world, himself a light.

107.name: Rogers
107.quote: You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is.

108.name: Sophocles
108.quote: There is no success without hardship.

109.name: Washington
109.quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him and to let him know that you trust him.

110.name: Mark
110.quote: Stand up for what's right, in small matters and large ones, and always do what you promise.

111.name: DiCaprio
111.quote: Only you alone can change your situation.

112.name: Blakely
112.quote: Don't be intimidated by what you don't know. This can be your greatest strength and ensure you do things differently from everyone else.

113.name: Navritilova
113.quote: Labels are for filing. Labels are for clothing. Labels are not for people.

114.name: Voltaire
114.quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.

115.name: Sinek
115.quote: If you actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.

116.name: Bailey
116.quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.

117.name: De Pree
117.quote: The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between the two, the leader must become a servant and a debtor.

118.name: Pink
118.quote: Control leads to compliance; autonomy leads to engagement.

119.name: Coolidge
119.quote: All growth depends on activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.

120.name: Sowell
120.quote: Politeness and consideration for others is like investing pennies and getting dollars back.

121.name: Kelly
121.quote: Remember the difference between a boss and a leader. A boss says, "Go!" -- a leader says, "Let's go!"

122.name: McGill
122.quote: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.

123.name: De Bono
123.quote: Effectiveness without values is a tool without a purpose.

124.name: Stanwyck
124.quote: I don't give a damn what other people think of me, as long as I'm doing something I think is right.

125.name: L'Amour
125.quote: Everyone has the power to say, "This I am today. That I shall be tomorrow."

126.name: West
126.quote: Confidence is a lot of this game. If you don't think you can, you won't.

127.name: Earhart
127.quote: Whether you are flying the Atlantic, selling sausages, building a skyscraper, driving a truck or painting a picture, your greatest power comes from the fact that you want tremendously to do that very thing well.

128.name: Gracian
128.quote: A single lie destroys a whole reputation of integrity.

129.name: Ford
129.quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.

130.name: Firestone
130.quote: It is only as we develop others that we permanently succeed.

131.name: Rogers
131.quote: I just hope I can spread some of the happiness that's been comming my way.

132.name: Rubin
132.quote: What we do every day matters more than what we do once in a while.

133.name: Kondo
133.quote: Keep only those things that speak to you heart. Then take the plunge and discard all the rest.

134.name: Garrison
134.quote: I will be as harsh as truth and as uncompromising as justice.
